activities:
Personal information entered by customers on the following Continental Web Sites: 

http://www.continental.com
http://www.cocargo.com
http://www.cocargo.com/cargo/
http://auction.continental.com
http://www.onepassauction.com

The information used on the Continental Web Sites consists of personal data collected during on-line transactions including but not limited to the purchase of airline tickets, and other products/services, and the administration of OnePass (frequent flyer) and Presidents Club (airport lounge) accounts.  This data permits such transactions, communicate promotional offers, as well as personalize our customers' current and future experiences with Continental through the Continental Web Site usage.
